channel.description: Recent content in talks on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: seminars and talks
item.description: seminars and invited talks Cost and performance: a composite indicator for separated waste collection in Italy - International Statistical Institute World Statistics Congress “Statistics and Data Science for a Better World” (ISI) (2021, The Hague, Netherlands - Virtual) Hierarchical Disjoint Nonnegative Factor Analysis - EconJobMarket Erasmus University Rotterdam (2019, Rotterdam, Netherlands) A composite indicator via hierarchical disjoint factor analysis for measuring the Italian football teams’ performances - Scientific Conference on Statistics for Healt and Well-Being (ASA) (2019, Brescia, Italy)
